descriptionHtml:
A conversion of the "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?]Crimson Twilight[/url]" armor by jmenaru for the CNHF Barbarian body by [url=http://iamthekingofsass.tumblr.com/]iamthekingofsass[/url]

[u]Install the original armor first[/u], then my conversion! I only included the meshes, so you must go to the original page to get the .esp and textures. Give jmenaru an endorsement for their amazing work while you're there.


Should work out of the box with  CNHF Barbarian, og CNHF, and any UNP bodies. [s]Let me know if I missed any major clipping problems, or if I mucked up the upload somehow[/s]. [b]EDIT[/b]: The first file did in fact have major clipping problems, and I did in fact muck up the upload. Live and learn! The updated file should fix both issues. ALSO, I allowed NMM download with this version, please let me know if that messed anything up!!

My other CNHF conversions thus far:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71843/?]The Lily Mash-up[/url] (available for download available in the optional files of the main page)


Mods used for pictures:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60389/?]Al-Dahna retex for Crimson Twilight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon ENB[/url]
author: antiquatedlace
